scripts.test:api: npm run build && k6 run dist/api-test.js
scripts.test:load: npm run build && k6 run dist/load-test.js
scripts.test:stress: npm run build && k6 run dist/stress-test.js
scripts.test:spike: npm run build && k6 run dist/spike-test.js
scripts.test:volume: npm run build && k6 run dist/volume-test.js
scripts.test:soak: npm run build && k6 run dist/soak-test.js
scripts.test:first: npm run build && k6 run dist/first-test.js
scripts.test:all: npm run test:api && npm run test:load && npm run test:stress && npm run test:spike && npm run test:volume && npm run test:soak
scripts.test:quick: npm run test:api && npm run test:load && npm run test:spike
scripts.test:performance: npm run test:load && npm run test:stress && npm run test:spike
scripts.test:stability: npm run test:volume && npm run test:soak
